name: color_to_picture
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool color_to_picture_api.
Tool description: Takes prompt of picture mode (L,RGB,RGBA), color in hex (example: ff03bc), width (example: 200), height (example: 200) and makes new image in single color
API description: Takes prompt of picture mode (L,RGB,RGBA), color in hex (example: ff03bc), width (example: 200), height (example: 200) and makes new image in single color)

height.description: The height of the image in pixels. Default is '200'.

color.description: The color of the image in hex format (e.g., 'ff0000'). Default is 'ff0000'.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels. Default is '200'.

mode.description: The mode of the image (e.g., 'L', 'RGB', 'RGBA'). Default is 'RGB'.
